item.title: TidyMicrobiome
item.description: TidyMicrobiome project is a comprehensive computational framework that can process the whole workflow of data processing and analysis for microbiome data using tidyverse principles.

item.title: MetNormalizer
item.description: MetNormalizer is used to normalize large scale metabolomics data.

item.title: deepPseudoMSI
item.description: The deepPseudoMSI project is the first method that convert LC-MS raw data to “images” and then process them using deep learning method for diagnosis.

item.title: laggedcor
item.description: TidyMass project is a comprehensive computational framework that can process the whole workflow of data processing and analysis for LC-MS-based untargeted metabolomics using tidyverse principles.

item.title: metID
item.description: metID is a R packge which is used for metabolite identification based on in-house database and public database based on accurate mass, rentention time and/or MS2 spectra.

item.title: TidyMass
item.description: TidyMass project is a comprehensive computational framework that can process the whole workflow of data processing and analysis for LC-MS-based untargeted metabolomics using tidyverse principles.

item.title: MetDNA
item.description: MetDNA characterizes initial seed metabolites using a small tandem spectral library, and utilize their experimental MS2 spectra as surrogate spectra to annotate their reaction-paired neighbor metabolites which are subsequently served as the basis for recursive analysis.

item.title: MetFlow
item.description: We developed an interactive web server, namely, MetFlow, to provide an integrated and comprehensive workflow for metabolomics data cleaning and differential metabolite discovery.
